Label.Script: ノベルシステム\メッセージボックス\終了待ち.lsb

Event.EventArg: MENUENABLED
[\x01]MESON|-1
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】とまどい.gal|NORMAL||||||
[\x01]CREATECG|サポート|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常無表情.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
NAMELABEL|002★★★デメア
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"The slimes in this forest, although not very strong, have
the special ability to immediately recover from injuries.
Wait for the enemy to exhaust their ＭＰ, then bring about
their defeat when they cannot recover."
[\x01]CREATECG|サポート|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常閉じ目.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
"If the slimes cannot be defeated due to their high ＨＰ and ＭＰ,
you can always let it fuck you until the enemy's ＭＰ is zero."
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情特殊】糸目B.gal|NORMAL||||||
NAMELABEL|001★★★主人公
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","001★★★主人公.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"Eh……ehh……?"
MESEND

I don't wanna die…… Not in a place like this……"

Label.Script: ノベルシステム\メッセージボックス\終了待ち.lsb

Event.EventArg: MENUENABLED
[\x01]MESON|-1
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】とまどい.gal|NORMAL||||||
[\x01]CREATECG|サポート|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常無表情.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
NAMELABEL|002★★★デメア
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"Orcs' main strength lies in their numbers, so don't be
afraid to fight them one-on-one.
But if you encounter a horde of them, you'd probably
be better off running away."
[\x01]CREATECG|サポート|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常閉じ目.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
"Also, if they defeat you, they'll drag you off to their main den.
If that happens, you'll be surrounded. Escape will be difficult."
MESEND

Label.Script: ノベルシステム\メッセージボックス\終了待ち.lsb

Event.EventArg: MENUENABLED
[\x01]MESON|-1
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】普通.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0
[\x01]CREATECG|サポート|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常無表情.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
NAMELABEL|002★★★デメア
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"Apparently, this hill was home to many royal palaces and tombs,
but it's mostly just a playground for fairies now. Fairies aren't like
demons, but their tricky magic can still disrupt your journey."
"Having enough WILL reduces the damage you'll take from enemy magic, and
increases the power of healing spells. INT increases the power of your own
magic attacks. Picking the right class and equipment can help maximize these."
MESEND

Label.Script: ノベルシステム\メッセージボックス\終了待ち.lsb

"S-Spooky……"
[\x01]CREATECG|サポート|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常無表情.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
NAMELABEL|002★★★デメア
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"Ghosts like the ones in here can only be damaged with
magic and special weapons. So watch out."
MESEND

Label.Script: ノベルシステム\メッセージボックス\終了待ち.lsb

Event.EventArg: MENUENABLED
[\x01]MESON|-1

[\x01]CREATECG|サポート|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常無表情.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
NAMELABEL|002★★★デメア
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"If you're trying to run from a battle, or escape an enemy's hold,
attempting to do so in succession greatly increases your chances of
success. Also, if you've just shaken off an enemy, they're much less
likely to try restraining you. So even if you feel trapped, don't give up."
MESEND

Label.Script: ノベルシステム\メッセージボックス\終了待ち.lsb

Event.EventArg: MENUENABLED
[\x01]MESON|-1
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】考える.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0
NAMELABEL|001★★★主人公
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","001★★★主人公.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"……This is an important highway connecting the eastern and western
Palas region. Ever since the demon army went on the attack, it's
been plagued with bandits, earning it the name "Thieves' Road"."
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】普通.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0
[\x01]CREATECG|サポート|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常無表情.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
NAMELABEL|002★★★デメア
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"Thieves are stupid and lustful, but they're good at
scoring critical hits, so watch out for that.
On the off chance you meet a thief who isn't
just some horny idiot, it might be best to run."
MESEND

Label.Script: ノベルシステム\メッセージボックス\終了待ち.lsb

NAMELABEL|002★★★デメア
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"If you're Cursed by enemy magic, the only ways to reverse
it are the Purify spell and Holy Water. However, when your
mouth is……obstructed, you can't chant the Purify spell.
So you'd better carry some Holy Water just in case."
MESEND

Label.Script: ノベルシステム\メッセージボックス\終了待ち.lsb

Event.EventArg: MENUENABLED
[\x01]MESON|-1

NAMELABEL|002★★★デメア
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"This sanctuary has existed since time immemorial…… Runoff from melting
snow in the Palas Mountains flows here to form this underground lake."
"If you wish to move north or south, just follow the water.
Going downstream takes you south, to the Holy City Pallant.
If you want to move north to the Monastery, go upstream."
MESEND

Label.Script: ノベルシステム\メッセージボックス\終了待ち.lsb

"どうしても犯されるのが嫌な場合は、敵がたまに落とすエッセンスを
入手すれば、犯された時と同じようにスキルを習得できるよ"

面倒だから、無理に狙わなくてもいいと思うけど"
